en.slogan: Stay connected, even under strict restrictions. With open source code and the XRay protocol, you can access any resource quickly and securely
en.faq_q1: How to register for the service?
en.faq_a1: When you register, you'll receive a unique ID, which will serve as your login. Passwords, email addresses, and other information are not required—just the ID.
en.faq_a2: We use XRay (VLESS-Reality). These are the most reliable and up-to-date solutions for bypassing blocking and ensuring speed.
en.faq_a3: Payment is only available in cryptocurrency (BTC, ETH, USDT, etc.). After the transaction, the system will automatically link your ID to the selected plan.
en.faq_q4: What devices does FOGVPN work on?
en.faq_a4: We support Windows, macOS, Linux, Android, and iOS using official configuration apps.
en.faq_q5: Connection problems. What should I do?
en.faq_a5: If you're unable to obtain the link or it does not work in the recommended Xray app, please contact us via support chat or email. We'll respond as soon as possible.
en.pricing_free_desc: Support for all OS | 1GB of traffic per day
en.privacy_protection: FOGVPN protects your online privacy. We don’t store or share data. To connect, you only need an ID — no password or email required
en.open_source_security: Our app is built on open-source principles, ensuring transparency and strong security.
en.encryption_location: Protect your location with advanced encryption. FOGVPN uses XRay to run secure protocols like VLESS-Reality
en.torrents_streaming: FOGVPN lets you download torrents, large files, stream videos, and play online games without restrictions — even on the free plan
en.xray_intro: XRay - is suitable for bypassing restrictions in countries with strict censorship, such as Russia and China. It provides stable connections and high security. Xray (VLESS + Reality)
en.xray_adv1: 1. Better Privacy – it hides your internet traffic so it looks like normal HTTPS (like browsing a website), not like VPN traffic
en.xray_adv2: 2. Hard to Block – even if a country or provider tries to block VPNs, Reality makes it much harder to detect and stop
en.xray_adv3: 3. Faster Connection – it is lighter than older protocols, so speed and latency are usually better
en.xray_adv4: 4. More Stable – works well even on weak or unstable networks
en.xray_adv5: 5. Future-proof – built on new technology that is being updated and supported
en.we_prioritize:
We prioritize your privacy and do not collect personal data.
Below you will receive a unique identifier, which is the only key to access your account.
en.already_have_account: If you already have an account ID, just log in to your account
